title: fix: add `to` prop to ButtonProps for React Router Link compatibility
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: The compiler is appeased
gist.blurb: Fixed a TypeScript definition that forgot buttons sometimes need to go places. The build pipeline is green again.
gist.summary: Added the `to` property to Button type definitions to support React Router Link usage without build errors.
gist.impact: Restores successful production builds by resolving TypeScript validation errors.
gist.visual_concept: The robot character fixing a connection between a button and a signpost (representing a link/path). The bee watches approvingly.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the robot connecting a wire from a chunky pixel button to a signpost. The bee mascot hovers nearby holding a wrench. Lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
